system.requirement: Once you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} (formidable or greater) in service to a seasoned warrior, and @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond} to train with themâ€¦

abilities.description: When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by sizing up your foe in a fight, or in a charged situation which may lead to a fight, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you study or train in a new weapon or technique, you may obtain and upgrade that combat talent for 1 fewer experience.

When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.12e23cfe23534a8f]{Turn the Tide} with a sudden change of weapon or technique, and your next move is a @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike}, add +1 and inflict +2 harm on a strong hit.
